title: Oxford Artificial Intelligence Programme
description: This programme is designed for managers, business leaders, and technical professionals to understand AI mechanics, its potential, and challenges. It covers the implications and limitations of AI and how to build a business case for its implementation.

title: Oxford Executive Diploma in Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: This diploma programme equips executives and future leaders with tools to ethically leverage AI in their organisations. It includes modules on technological disruption, big data, machine learning, AI in practice, and strategic leadership in the age of AI.

title: MSc in Advanced Computer Science
description: This master's programme combines theory and practice, teaching advanced techniques and ideas in AI, machine learning, and other areas. It includes mathematical models, data analysis, and applications of AI in various domains.

title: Technology and AI: Online Courses
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: These online courses provide flexible learning options covering various aspects of AI and technology, designed for professionals and those with prior knowledge of AI.
